meanings.sent1: The cheetah outgalloped the lion in the race.
meanings.sent2: The horse outgalloped the donkey on the track.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a race and outgalloped him!
meanings.sent4: Her determination outgalloped her doubts as she sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The wind outgalloped the storm, clearing the skies in an instant.

meanings.sent1: The gazelle outgalloped the hyena to safety.
meanings.sent2: The champion racehorse outgalloped all its competitors effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit outgalloped the turtle, surprising everyone with its speed.
meanings.sent4: His heart outgalloped his mind as he ran towards his loved one.
meanings.sent5: The river outgalloped the rocks, flowing swiftly downstream.
